titles: Mischeefes mysterie: or, Treasons master-peece, the Powder-plot Inuented by hellish malice, preuented by heauenly mercy: truely related. And from the Latine of the learned and reuerend Doctour Herring translated, and very much dilated. By Iohn Vicars.
author: Herring, Francis, d. 1628.
Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
publisher: Printed by E. Griffin, dwelling in the Little Olde Bayly neere the signe of the Kings-head,
notes: The second part has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Gunpowder Plot, 1605 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
Catholics --  England --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
